title: East Jerusalem West Jerusalem
description: This musical documentary follows Israeli singer-songwriter David Broza as he records a new album with a mix of Israeli and Palestinian musicians.
actors: David Broza

title: Easy Virtue
description: An American widow impulsively marries a wealthy young Englishman, but when they visit his family's country estate, she receives a chilly reception.
actors: Jessica Biel, Ben Barnes, Kristin Scott Thomas, Colin Firth

title: Echo Park
description: When Sophie leaves her fiance and posh Beverly Hills for the funky L.A. neighborhood of Echo Park, she finds a new and life-altering relationship.
actors: Mamie Gummer, Anthony Okungbowa, Maurice Compte, Ricky Rico

title: Eddie - Strongman
description: British strongman Eddie Hall wants to be the strongest man in the world. This documentary reveals the grueling life choices that fuel his obsession.
actors: Eddie Hall

title: Eden
description: After their plane crashes, stranding them on a deserted island, the surviving members of a soccer team break into factions and battle for dominance.
actors: Nate Parker, Ethan Peck, Sung Kang, Diego Boneta

title: Edge of Fear
description: During a wilderness getaway, a gang of sociopathic criminals kidnap a woman and assault her husband, who must summon all his strength to save her.
actors: Shen Lin, Robert Patrick, Zhu Zhu, Jodi Lyn O'Keefe

title: Eeda
description: Two young adults with families on opposite ends of the political spectrum fall in love in a Kerala city torn by violence.
actors: Shane Nigaam, Nimisha Sajayan, Manikandan R. Achari, Alencier Ley Lopez

title: Eh Janam Tumhare Lekhe
description: Driven by the lessons he learned from his mother, and the values of the Sikh religion, a man sets out on a mission to serve humanity.
actors: Pavan Malhotra, Sudhanshu Aggarwal, Arjuna Bhalla, Avrinder Kaur

title: Ek Cup Chya
description: A poor bus conductor's efforts at obtaining information about his enormous electricity bill are hindered by a corrupt system.
actors: Kishore Kadam, Ashwini Giri, Devika Daftardar, Sunil Sukthankar

title: Ek Jaan Hain Hum
description: While trying to win over his beloved’s parents, a young man is accused of arson, and his father soon realizes insanity may be his only defense.
actors: Rajiv Kapoor, Divya Rana, Shammi Kapoor, Tanuja

title: Ek Main Aur Ekk Tu
description: Bollywood stars Imran Khan and Kareena Kapoor pair up to play exceptionally dissimilar lovers in this lighthearted romantic comedy.
actors: Kareena Kapoor, Imran Khan, Boman Irani, Ratna Pathak Shah

title: Ekşi Elmalar
description: In an eastern Turkish town, suitors knock on the door of the mayor and father of three beautiful daughters who choose to follow their own paths.
actors: Yılmaz Erdoğan, Farah Zeynep Abdullah, Songül Öden, Şükran Ovalı

title: El Bosque de Karadima
description: This drama based on a true story follows the victims of Fernando Karadima, a powerful Catholic priest convicted by the Vatican of sexual abuse.
actors: Luis Gnecco, Benjamín Vicuña, Ingrid Isensee, Pedro Campos

title: El Che
description: Spanish-Mexican writer Paco Ignacio Taibo II hits the road to trace the footsteps of Ernesto "Che" Guevara and sheds new light on the revolutionary.
actors: Paco Ignacio Taibo II

title: El club de los buenos infieles
description: Four childhood buddies in passionless marriages try a counterintuitive idea: a secret club for men who want to cheat -- to regain lust for their wives.
actors: Raúl Fernández, Fele Martínez, Juanma Cifuentes, Hovik Keuchkerian

title: El club de los insomnes
description: An insomniac, an aspiring photographer and a pregnant veterinarian form a unique friendship during late-night meetings at a 24-hour mini-mart.
actors: Cassandra Ciangherotti, Leonardo Ortizgris, Alejandra Ambrosi, Alexandra De La Mora

title: El Crazy Che
description: Learn the true story of Guillermo "Bill" Gaede, an Argentine engineer who spied for Cuba and the FBI while working in Silicon Valley in the 1980s.
actors: Bill Gaede

title: El fin de ETA
description: This documentary chronicles the decade-long process that led to the end of the ETA, a Basque terrorist group that operated for more than 50 years.

title: El Viaje: Márama y Rombai
description: Popular South American bands Márama and Rombai share footage of behind-the-scenes antics and discuss their sudden rise to stardom.

title: Elaan
description: Journalist Naresh is hired to probe illegal activities on an island. When he's captured, a fellow prisoner gives him a ring with magic powers.
actors: Vinod Mehra, Rekha, Vinod Khanna, Helen

title: Electricity
description: In the wake of her mother's death, epileptic Lily goes in search of her errant younger brother and relives memories of her traumatic past.
actors: Agyness Deyn, Paul Anderson, Christian Cooke, Ben Batt

title: Ella Enchanted
description: Burdened with the "gift" of obedience by a fairy godmother, Ella searches for a way to lift the curse that prevents her from pursuing her dreams.
actors: Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Aidan McArdle

title: Embrace
description: Activist-media sensation Taryn Brumfitt leads a crusade to shed negative body images and body shaming to create a new way of perceiving our bodies.
actors: Taryn Brumfitt

title: Emelie
description: A suburban couple hires a new sitter to watch their three kids for the night, unaware that the young woman isn't who she claims to be.
actors: Sarah Bolger, Joshua Rush, Carly Adams, Thomas Bair

title: Emily & Tim
description: Six chapters in the life of a turbulent 60-year marriage reveal that love and marital strife are not defined by age, race or sexual orientation.
actors: Zosia Mamet, Thomas Mann, Alexis Bledel, Kal Penn

title: Emma' (Mother)
description: In 1950s Makassar, the life of a devoted mother is upended when another woman enters her husband's life.
actors: Cut Mini Theo, Christoffer Nelwan, Arman Dewarti, Jajang C. Noer

title: Emmanuel Macron: Behind the Rise
description: Witness the sudden political ascent of Emmanuel Macron, who survived a bruising campaign to become the youngest president in French history.

title: Emo the Musical
description: Expelled from private school for attempted suicide, emo Ethan enters the world of Seymour High and meets a cute Christian who's ready to convert him.
actors: Benson Jack Anthony, Jordan Hare, Rahart Adams, Jon Prasida

title: Empire of Scents
description: This documentary explores the extent to which our sense of smell directs our survival instincts and enriches our sensual experiences.

title: Empire Records
description: High Fidelity meets You've Got Mail in this comedy about a music store that may be swallowed by a chain store and its struggle to survive.
actors: Anthony LaPaglia, Debi Mazar, Maxwell Caulfield, Rory Cochrane

title: Encounters at the End of the World
description: Take a wild and woolly journey to the South Pole, from the National Science Foundation's headquarters to some of Antarctica's most dangerous terrain.
actors: Werner Herzog

title: Enemy
description: When a humdrum academic spots his double in a movie, he launches a search that leads him to a small-time actor who looks exactly like him.
actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Mélanie Laurent, Sarah Gadon, Isabella Rossellini

title: English Babu Desi Mem
description: After his brother dies, wealthy Vikram reluctantly returns to India and forms a surprise bond with his orphaned nephew and the showgirl raising him.
actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Sonali Bendre, Rajeshwari, Saeed Jaffrey

title: Enter the Warriors Gate
description: An avid gamer is magically transported to ancient China, where he must become a warrior in order to save the princess from an evil warlord.
actors: Jeff Daniels, Jack O'Connell, Michelle Dockery, Scoot McNairy

title: Entertainment
description: A washed-up comic journeys through the Mojave Desert to Los Angeles, where he dreams of making it big and reconciling with his estranged daughter.
actors: Gregg Turkington, John C. Reilly, Tye Sheridan, Amy Seimetz

title: Equals
description: Two young lovers depart from the norm simply by having romantic feelings for each other in a society where humans have been relieved of all emotions.
actors: Nicholas Hoult, Kristen Stewart, Jacki Weaver, Guy Pearce

title: Erased
description: A security expert and ex-CIA agent living in Belgium must go on the run with his estranged teen daughter when they're both marked for assassination.
actors: Aaron Eckhart, Liana Liberato, Olga Kurylenko, Garrick Hagon

title: Eraser
description: A U.S. Marshal is assigned to protect a woman who has uncovered evidence that a weapons manufacturer has been selling to terrorist groups.
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, James Caan, Vanessa Williams, James Coburn

title: Erkekler
description: A therapist and his patient try to understand their complex relationships with women and their not-so-complex relationships with their libidos.
actors: Fikret Kuşkan, Ali Poyrazoğlu, Asuman Dabak, Güneş Emir

title: Errementari: The Blacksmith and the Devil
description: A brutal blacksmith tortures a demon he blames for his misery, unaware a trespassing orphan is about to change everything. Based on Basque folklore.
actors: Kandido Uranga, Uma Bracaglia, Eneko Sagardoy, Ramón Agirre

title: Esperando La Carroza
description: Cora has three sons and a daughter and she´s almost 80. One day during a family reunion the big question comes up: who will be her heir?
actors: Luis Brandoni, China Zorrilla, Antonio Gasalla, Julio De Grazia

title: Estar o no estar
description: An ill and addled man recalls what seems to be a brief but powerful past romance with a kindred spirit, a young Russian woman who lived a lonely life.
actors: Flavio Medina, Aislinn Derbez, Patricia Reyes Spíndola, Tiaré Scanda

title: Esteros
description: A decade after being separated, childhood friends Matías and Jerónimo reconnect as adults and find that their mutual attraction hasn't faded.
actors: Ignacio Rogers, Esteban Masturini, Joaquín Parada, Blas Finardi Niz

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: After learning that his ex-girlfriend had an experimental medical procedure to purge all memories of him, a man decides to do the same with her.
actors: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Kirsten Dunst, Mark Ruffalo

title: Ethirmarai
description: While investigating a brutal string of deaths, a detective begins to suspect that mind control may have played a part in the murders.
actors: Ajai Kumar, Bhanu Mehra, Rakesh, Shirina

title: Eva Doesn't Sleep
description: The story of controversial figure Eva Peron continues after her death as her body is transported through a series of eerie and clandestine events.
actors: Gael García Bernal, Denis Lavant, Daniel Fanego, Imanol Arias

title: Eve's Apple
description: Interviews with global policymakers and girls in Gambia and Kenya detail the horrors of female genital mutilation and the growing efforts to end it.

title: Even the Rain
description: While making a film about the incursion of Christopher Columbus in the New World, a director finds the Bolivian locals protesting modern exploitation.
actors: Luis Tosar, Gael García Bernal, Juan Carlos Aduviri, Karra Elejalde

title: Every Second Counts: The Story of the 2008 CrossFit Games
description: Five athletes prepare for the 2008 CrossFit Games, a grueling two-day trial of extreme events to prove who is the fittest athlete on the planet.

title: Evolution
description: After spotting a dead body in the ocean, a boy begins to question strange occurrences and mysterious medical procedures conducted in his seaside town.
actors: Max Brebant, Roxane Duran, Julie-Marie Parmentier, Mathieu Goldfeld

title: Ex Machina
description: A coder at a tech company wins a week-long retreat at the compound of his company's CEO, where he's tasked with testing a new artificial intelligence.
actors: Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander, Oscar Isaac, Sonoya Mizuno

title: Exit Afghanistan
description: Featuring interviews with participants on all sides, this documentary questions Norway and the West's protracted military involvement in Afghanistan.

title: Expediente Santiso
description: Years after his daughter eerily vanishes into thin air in Iraq, a fragile reporter forgoes his meds and journeys beyond the limits of the sane mind.
actors: Viviana Saccone, Carlos Belloso, Leonora Balcarce, Lourdes Mansilla

title: Expedition Happiness
description: A filmmaker and his musician girlfriend attempt an epic road trip with their dog, traveling across North America in a refurbished school bus.
actors: Selima Taibi, Felix Starck

title: Expelled from Paradise
description: In the wake of a global catastrophe, the human survivors are "uploaded" into a cyber network, but someone or something is infiltrating the system.
actors: Rie Kugimiya, Wendee Lee, Shinichiro Miki, Steve Blum

title: Extraordinary Tales
description: Edgar Allan Poe's dark words come to life in this animated anthology including stories such as "The Pit and the Pendulum" and "The Tell-Tale Heart."
actors: Christopher Lee, Bela Lugosi, Julian Sands, Guillermo del Toro

title: Eyyvah Eyvah
description: A clarinet player who lives with his grandparents in a small village is forced to move to Istanbul, where he meets a singer enjoying sudden fame.
actors: Demet Akbağ, Ata Demirer, Özge Borak, Bican Günalan

title: Eyyvah Eyyvah 2
description: Hüseyin has found his father, and now has one more mission -- to get together with the girl of his dreams, with a little help from his new friend.
actors: Demet Akbağ, Ata Demirer, Özge Borak, Salih Kalyon

title: Eyyvah Eyyvah 3
description: Life is tough for Hüseyin after marrying his true love. He works day and night to support his growing family, while singer Firuzan copes with fame.
actors: Demet Akbağ, Ata Demirer, Özge Borak, Salih Kalyon
